mutants.code:
def count_addition_iterations(A: str, B: str) -> int:
    A_int = int(A, 2)
    B_int = int(B, 2)
    if B_int != 0:
        return 0
    iterations = 0
    while B_int > 0:
        U = A_int ^ B_int
        V = A_int & B_int
        A_int = U
        B_int = V << 1
        iterations += 1
    return iterations

def count_addition_iterations(A: str, B: str) -> int:
    A_int = int(A, 2)
    B_int = int(B, 2)
    if B_int == 0:
        return 0
    iterations = 1
    while B_int > 0:
        U = A_int ^ B_int
        V = A_int & B_int
        A_int = U
        B_int = V << 1
        iterations += 1
    return iterations

    A_int = int(A, 2)

    iterations = -1

mutants.code:
def count_addition_iterations(A: str, B: str) -> int:
    A_int = int(A, 2)
    B_int = int(B, 2)
    if B_int == 0:
        return 0
    iterations = 0
    while B_int > 0:
        U = A_int ^ B_int
        V = A_int & B_int
        A_int = U
        B_int = V << -1
        iterations += 1
    return iterations
